day_classification: Type of day (e.g., weekday, weekend, holiday)
distance_km: Distance in kilometers from supplier to store or warehouse
expiration_status: Indicates whether the product is expired or still valid.
in_season: Indicates if the product is currently in season
inventory_turnover_rate: Shows how often inventory is sold and replaced over a period.
is_holiday: Indicates if the day is a public holiday
is_weekend: Indicates if the day falls on a weekend
lead_time: estimated delivery duration (in days) for each product-supplier combination
maximum_days_on_sale: Maximum number of days the product can be on sale
min_stock: Minimum stock level before restocking is required
precipitation_classification: Weather classification based on precipitation levels
product: Name or description of the product
received_date: Date the product was received in inventory
reorder_point: Stock level at which a reorder should be triggered
sales_demand: Estimated or actual demand for the product
sales_volume: Total units sold over a given period
shelf_life_days: Number of days the product remains sellable
stock_quantity: Current quantity of the product in stock
storage_recommendation: Recommended storage conditions for the product
supplier: Name of the supplier providing the product
supplier_rating: Rating of the supplier based on performance or quality
unit_of_measurement: Unit used to quantify the product (e.g., kg, liters)
wind_classification: Weather classification based on wind intensity
